Package com.azure.spring.cloud.resourcemanager.implementation.crud

Interface ResourceCrud<T,K,P>

Type Parameters:
T - Azure resource type
K - Azure resource key type
P - Azure resource properties.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractResourceCrud, EventHubNamespaceCrud, EventHubsConsumerGroupCrud, EventHubsCrud, RedisCacheCrud, ResourceGroupCrud, ServiceBusNamespaceCrud, ServiceBusQueueCrud, ServiceBusTopicCrud, ServiceBusTopicSubscriptionCrud, StorageAccountCrud
public interface ResourceCrud<T,K,P>
Interface to support CRUD of Azure Resource
